🛢Rex International Holding (REXI SP)🔸Both revenue and PATMI skyrocketed as averaged realized sold oil price increased from US$34 to US$67/bbl. FY21 revenue and PATMI was at US$158m (US$47m in 2020) and US$79m (-US$15.2m loss in 2020)  forming 106% and 150% of our full year forecasts.🔸Including liquid quoted investments  Rex now boasts a cash war chest of US$86m  up from US$46m in 2020.🔸Also  Rex is moving onto SGX’s mainboard as of 8th Mar 2022  allowing the company to reach out to more institutional investors moving forward.
